meanings.definition: A place in a hospital where patients who are not seriously ill are cared for.
meanings.sent1: The infirmary is where people go when they are a little sick.
meanings.sent2: She visited her friend in the infirmary after a minor accident.
meanings.sent3: The infirmary was so quiet, it felt like a library for sick people.
meanings.sent4: To her, the infirmary was a sanctuary away from the chaos of the main hospital.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the infirmary walls made it a cheerful place to recover.

meanings.sent1: The small town had only one infirmary to serve all its residents.
meanings.sent2: He worked as a nurse in the infirmary located in the heart of the city.
meanings.sent3: The infirmary was bustling with activity, like a busy beehive.
meanings.sent4: In her dreams, the infirmary transformed into a magical castle of healing.
meanings.sent5: The old building had been transformed into a beautiful infirmary for the community.
